sn14.35:1: Sāvatthiyaṁ vihārati. "Yo, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati. Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi. Yo āpodhātuṁ abhinandati … pe … yo tejodhātuṁ … yo vāyodhātuṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati. Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn14.35:2: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati. Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi. Yo āpodhātuṁ … pe … yo tejodhātuṁ … yo vāyodhātuṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati. Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmī"ti.
